title: Housing in Scotland
creator_credit: Merlin Films, Great Britain. Ministry of Information and Gilbert Gunn
brief_description: Recalls Scotland’s efforts in pioneering housing schemes and gives details of the immediate postwar plans for building. Looks at temporary structures, to meet emergency needs; two-family dwellings which can later be converted into single dwellings; and permanent modern homes. Although the film deals with a serious subject, its approach is occasionaly light and humourous.
